channel.title: Swedish Tech Events
channel.description: Events for developers, technologists, and other geeks in Sweden

item.title: 2021-06-29 17:30 Teaser: Kubernetes - West Forest Tech meetup
item.description: Kubernetes is an open-source container-orchestration system for automating application deployment, scaling, and management. It was originally designed by Google, and is now maintained by the Cloud Native Computing Foundation. Mikael is a consultant at West Forest Techno...

item.title: 2021-04-07 18:00 Afterwork Hacking @ Comfort Hotel Westeras - Västerås Coffee and Code
item.description: Beroende på Corona-situationen så blir det inga möten på onsdagar en tid framöver.

item.title: 2021-04-07 08:00 This weeks Lean Coffee - Stockholm Lean Coffee
item.description: Like to limit WIP (Work-In-Process), visualization of workflows and self-organizing teams? Want to meet others like you and learn more about Lean and Agile? We are few enthusiasts who meet every Wednesday morning since May 2010, to exchange thoughts and experiences over a cup ...

item.title: 2021-05-27 18:00 STOCKHOLM TECH JOB FAIR - Stockholm TechMeetups
item.description: Welcome Employers and Job Seekers! Whether you are looking for a job or recruiting, Tech Job Fair is the place to be! The speed dating event for recruiting! Come to meet employers, ask questions, and make connections. This event will target local job seekers from...

item.title: 2021-04-10 16:00 Outdoor Workout - Outdoor Workout - Sollentuna (Sjöberg)
item.description: Hello everyone ! Let's workout together at the Utegym Tressfit facility based in Sollentuna (Sjöberg). We will focus on body weight exercices (pull-ups, chin-ups, dips, push-ups, etc..) & calisthenics. You can also bring your own weights, resistance bands for i...

item.title: 2021-06-06 11:00 Säkerhetskryssning 2020 - Dataföreningen Meet&Learn Stockholmskretsen
item.description: SÄKERHETSKRYSSNINGEN SENARELÄGGS PGA COVID-19 Tyvärr måste vi flytta fram datumet för konferensen ytterligare pga det rådande läget med covid-19. Säkerhetskryssningen som skulle äga rum 6-8 september 2020 kommer istället genomföras 6-8 juni 2021. Uppdateringar och mer informat...
